monoZConnect/monozconnect-hostCommunicat.title: Host Communication
monoZConnect/monozconnect-hostCommunicat.description: Communication with monoZConnect Service(MZCS) Application. MZCS can be installed on Windows/Linux platform and using the MZCS commands, users can communicate to monoZConnect with MZCS.

monoZConnect/monozconnect-index.title: monoZ:Connect
monoZConnect/monozconnect-index.description: monoZ:Connect is an industrial grade NIDD dongle used for overseeing and analyzing Windows/Linux machines and equipment located worldwide in hospitals and factories. It is specifically developed to meet the stringent data security requirements of these industries, ensuring reliable remote diagnostics monitoring.

monoZConnect/monozconnect-intro.title: Overview
monoZConnect/monozconnect-intro.description: monoZ:Connect is an industrial grade NIDD dongle used for overseeing and analyzing Windows/Linux machines and equipment located worldwide in hospitals and factories. It is specifically developed to meet the stringent data security requirements of these industries, ensuring reliable remote diagnostics monitoring.

monoZJet/monozjet-hostCommunication.title: Host Communication
monoZJet/monozjet-hostCommunication.description: monoZ:Jet utilizes USB or cascade UART for Host to module communication and comes preconfigured with application firmware that automates complex network and platform communication processes.

monoZLink/monoZLink-index.title: monoZ:Link
monoZLink/monoZLink-index.description: monoZLink supports popular IoT protocols such as MQTT, HTTP thereby fostering IoT in user`s existing device environment. With features for device provisioning, SIM/Device management & FOTA, monoZLink are connected by private communication, high security is ensured when sending data from the device without using security protocols such as TLS thereby enabling high data savings on the connectivity. Learn how to set up your account, create protocol configuration & groups, manage monoZ:Jet and host firmware, and more.

monoZLink/monozlink-intro.title: Overview
monoZLink/monozlink-intro.description: monoZLink supports popular IoT protocols such as MQTT, HTTP thereby fostering IoT in user`s existing device environment. With features for device provisioning, SIM/Device management & FOTA, monoZLink are connected by private communication, high security is ensured when sending data from the device without using security protocols such as TLS thereby enabling high data savings on the connectivity. Learn how to set up your account, create protocol configuration & groups, manage monoZ:Jet and host firmware, and more.

monoZLink/protocolConfiguration/monoZLin.title: AWS IoT Core
monoZLink/protocolConfiguration/monoZLin.description: In this guide we will walkthrough setting up a “thing” in AWS IoT core to receive data from monoZLink and attach it to device group.

monoZLink/protocolConfiguration/monoZLin.title: Webhook
monoZLink/protocolConfiguration/monoZLin.description: In this guide we will walkthrough setting up Webhook configuration in monoZLink.

quickstartguide/quickstart-pockit.title: monoZ:Jet POC Kit
quickstartguide/quickstart-pockit.description: Welcome to the Quickstart Guide for setting up your monoZ POC kit. In this guide we shall cover from POC kit unboxing and demonstrate how to send your first message from your monoZLink and vice versa. This is a quickstart guide and for detailed description & limitations of individual features/commands, check out the respective sections in monoZ docs site.
